author: Staff Reporter
text:
R. Rajika (30), resident in an apartment at Bharathi Colony in Peelamedu, was declared brain dead after falling off the third floor of the building on Sunday night.

The police said that the victim was the daughter of a leading doctor.

Rajika was admitted in a private hospital where she was declared as brain dead.

Peelamedu Police were investigating the incident.
title: Woman declared brain dead after falling off building
